did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence from Gertrude Shorb Martin of the American Association of University Women, and Catherine Bauer of the Labor Housing Conference concerning legislation on matters of public housing and the workers movement.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence from Gertrude Shorb Martin of the American Association of University Women, and Catherine Bauer of the Labor Housing Conference concerning legislation on matters of public housing and the workers movement.
